title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe a section of the Constitution that a group such as the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) would likely say is most affected by the USA PATRIOT ACT.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how checks and balances could work to ensure that the section of the Constitution identified in Part A would be protected.

For Task C, the response must explain a concept that the action/scenario illustrates.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
